yoruba: Àṣá kì í rà kádìẹ gbé kòkòrò dání.
gold: When a kite hovers, a chicken does not hang on to an insect.
gen: The Yoruba proverb "Àṣá kì í rà kádìẹ gbé kòkòrò dání" translates to "The hawk does not carry a chick while holding an insect." This proverb suggests that one cannot handle two tasks or responsibilities at the same time effectively, emphasizing the importance of focusing on one thing at a time.
